DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate clinical pregnancy rate per embryo transfer oocytes recipient obtain ovarian stimulation luteal phase oocytes donor . This study perform egg recipient donor type treatment meant implement fertility preservation patient
DOC.brief_title: Evolutive Potential Embryos Obtained From Oocytes After Luteal Phase Ovarian Stimulation
DOC.criteria: premenopausal woman , 1835 year old , FSH level < 10 mIU/ml ; AFC > 10 regular cycle BMI < 28 sign inform consent Recipients : Infertile woman eligible oocyte donation BMI < 35 Signed inform consent form Polycystic ovarian syndrome , gonadotropins allergy Recipients : Women eligible oocyte donation BMI > 35 Uncontrolled Endocrine Pathology
